mapper.select: select u.id as uuid, username, password, r.id as id, r.name as name from security.user as u join security.user_to_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id join security.role as r on r.id = ur.role_id where u.username = #{name}

select u.id as uuid, username, password, r.id as id, r.name as name from security.user as u join security.user_to_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id join security.role as r on r.id = ur.role_id where u.id = #{uuid}

select u.id as uuid, username, password, r.id as id, r.name as name from security.user as u left join security.user_to_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join security.role as r on r.id = ur.role_id
mapper.insert: insert into security.user (id, username, password) values (#{uuid}, #{user.username}, #{user.password})
